name: agentql-mcp
description: This is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that integrates [AgentQL](https://agentql.com)'s data extraction capabilities.

tools.name: extract-web-data
tools.description: Extracts structured data as JSON from a web page given a URL using a Natural Language description of the data.

url.description: The URL of the public webpage to extract data from

prompt.description: Natural Language description of the data to extract from the page

prompts.name: Extract YouTube search results
prompts.description: Extract structured data from YouTube search results
prompts.text: Extract the list of videos from the page https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=agentql, every video should have a title, an author name, a number of views and a url to the video. Make sure to exclude ads items. Format this as a markdown table.

AGENTQL_API_KEY.description: API key from AgentQL Dev Portal
AGENTQL_API_KEY.title: AGENTQL_API_KEY
